title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing parents quarreling in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a parental quarrel in a dream. This vision is considered one of the visions that many people wonder about. It is considered one of the disturbing visions and carries many connotations that differ after what a person sees. They dream of details, quarreling with the mother or with the father, or quarreling together, and some are curious to know its meanings, and in this article we will learn about the dream interpretation of seeing a parental quarrel in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a parental quarrel in a dream, as there are many interpretations that interpretation scholars have talked about for this The vision, which is sometimes not a good interpretation, and in this context we will learn the interpretation of the dream of seeing parents quarreling in a dream is also: Sometimes this vision is an indication that the dreamer is performing some actions that cause grief to the mother and father. Whereas if one sees in a dream that his father and his deceased mother are arguing This dream is evidence that the dreamer has committed many forbidden and bad deeds, and he must repent to God Almighty and follow the straight path. Seeing a person in a dream is a disagreement with his parents. It is evidence of his suffering from many obstacles that will lead to failure in the things he wants to achieve. In this life. Also, it is a metaphor that the dreamer will go through extreme psychological fatigue, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: I dreamed that I found gold and took it to the highest interpreters for married and single women. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a divorced mother, especially since this dream is repeated in the dreams of many individuals, except that The interpretations and interpretations it contains differ according to the social status of the priest, as he differs from a single woman, from a pregnant woman, and from a widow. In this paragraph we will begin to understand the interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a divorced mother. It is also: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is arguing with her mother. This is an indication of a state of sadness. This woman is experiencing extreme hardship. It is also evidence of the pressures and psychological problems that this visionary is exposed to, which causes her to lose her confidence in those around her. You also see the quarrel with the mother of the divorced woman, and that someone she does not know breaks up the quarrel between them. This indicates that this person wants to communicate with her and marry her. She will be happy in the life to come, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing jahamah in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men. Interpretation of quarreling with the mother in a dream for men, especially since the interpretation of dreams, despite the similarity, differs from woman to man, and arguing with mother in a dream about feet carries connotations that can They are warning messages that alert him, and in this paragraph we learn in detail about the interpretation of quarreling with his mother in a dream for a man: If a person sees in a dream that he is arguing with his mother in a dream, this dream is an indication that he does many things in real life. This vision warns him to repent and desist from These detestable actions. And this is before some events happen to him that reach the critical stage. Then he will not be able to retreat, or he will not be able to remedy the situation, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about henna for a single and married woman.

title: Interpretation of wind in a dream and stormy winds in a dream

preview.html: The concept of light winds with heavy dust, a wind storm, and a tornado for a single woman, for a married woman, and for a pregnant woman. Seeing the wind suggests power in itself, because of its power and control over the beings beneath it. The wind in a dream may indicate the king and his army or his orders and assistants, and the wind was a servant of Solomon the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. The wind in the dream may indicate the king and his army or his orders and assistants. The dream indicates torment, pain, and calamity, due to the large number of trees that fall and the sinking of ships when it blows or rages, especially if they are fierce or strong, and the winds have destroyed the people of Aad. The wind, in some interpretations, indicates fertility, profit, and victory, as well as victory. The Messenger, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, said Peace and blessings be upon him: The Arabs in ancient times called it samba because it corresponds to the winds of the wasp. The winds show illnesses and illnesses that spread to humans, such as colds and headaches, and from this people say: This is a stormy wind; Because it is a disease created by God Almighty when the wind and air change or the season changes. Whoever sees in his dream a wind carrying him without fear or panic, then he will take charge of people’s affairs, if it suits him, and perhaps he will lead and be kidnapped to serve him or travel on the sea. A sane person if he is qualified to do so, or one who promotes his goods if his trade was previously stagnant. It was said that the wind in a dream is a shift that increases sustenance or removes and increases poverty and need. Winds that cause hurricanes, destruction, or loss are not welcome in visions and may indicate the dreamer’s problems and fears. Winds that cause Causing drowning or death in a dream is a sign of strife, wars, and disputes. Whoever sees the wind in a dream uprooting trees, demolishing homes, or flying people and animals, then this is an affliction that affects people in general, such as epidemics, disasters, wars, raids, and invasions. If the wind is calm or from winds of pollen, and if people In the event of injustice, hardship, an epidemic, or a siege, their bad conditions change and their anguish and sadness are removed. As for the smell of poison in a dream, it indicates diseases, and winds of yellow color can indicate problems and diseases of the body. Whoever dreams in a dream that the winds carry him from one place to another, then he He reaches a place better than his, and perhaps the dream indicates a journey from which there is no return, according to what the Almighty says. The wind falls in a far place) Surat Al-Hajj Verse 31 The wind that blows on a city or camp, if they are at war, then they will perish. Gentle, clear and soft winds like a breeze are in a dream a sign of goodness and blessings, and storms in a dream show the injustice of the rulers. Winds accompanied by dirt or sand and gravel indicate war and fighting. Source: The Great Interpretation of Dreams, attributed to Sheikh Ibn Shirin, Chapter: Interpretation of the sky, air, night, day, wind, rain, floods, eclipse, earthquakes, lightning, thunder, rainbow If you dream that the wind is blowing gently and sadly, it means that great wealth will come to you with the loss of what you have. If you hear the wind moaning, it means that you will miss someone whose life is empty without you. If you walked quickly in front of a raging wind , it means that you will courageously resist temptation

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating mango for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a divorced woman eating mangoes in a dream. Dreams have many meanings. They carry good or bad meanings. All of these and more are the details that interest you, according to the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman eating mangoes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman eating mangoes in a dream can It is a reference to lawful money, and God knows the unseen. Eating ripe mangoes outside the season can also indicate goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a mango that a divorced woman has picked, it may represent a profit, God willing. Wherever it appears, what is the goodness and sustenance that she obtains, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating pasta for a divorced woman. In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about eating pasta for a divorced woman in a dream can lead to goodness, and God has all knowledge. If a divorced woman sees pasta in a dream, it can be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. When she sees pasta for a divorced woman in a dream, it can be a sign of goodness and living, God willing. Seeing pasta for a divorced woman can also express a beautiful appreciation from God, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating oysters for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating oysters for a divorced woman in a dream. Oysters can be a sign of quick decisions, and God knows the unseen. Oysters can also indicate an inability to think and make decisions. Decisions, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees oysters, this may lead to happiness, God willing. If a married woman sees oysters, it can represent stability and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating apricots for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating apricots for a divorced woman in a dream, it could lead to illness, and God knows the unseen. In While seeing green apricots may express a marriage proposal, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a divorced woman sees green apricots in a dream, this could be a sign of safety, God willing. When a divorced woman eats yellow apricots in a dream, this may be a sign of material loss, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream Eating red apples for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating red apples in a dream. The desire to eat red apples for a divorced woman could be a sign of marriage, God willing. If a divorced woman is seen buying red apples, this may indicate good things, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees apples Red in a dream, this may be a sign of progress in her work, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees a red apple, this may indicate food, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating red berries for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating red berries for a divorced woman in a dream. We did not find Specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing berries for a divorced woman may express a mood of trouble, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees berries in a dream, it may be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees berries in a dream, this could be a sign of good changes, God willing. title: Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping and the meaning of slippers and abandonment in a dream in good and evil situations

preview.html: Here is the dream interpretation of kidnapping. Kidnapping is an annoying dream that many cannot interpret, and this vision often means failure, envy, fear, anxiety, and loss, but surviving kidnapping means solving problems and dying from anxiety, secrecy, and sadness, so in this article we learn about the most important dreams that were reported about kidnapping, and study An explanation of the kidnapping of Ibn Sirin and the escape of single girls, married women, divorced women, and pregnant women, and various cases detailed through an encyclopedia. Follow us.Interpretation of a dream about kidnapping: A dream about kidnapping someone from the dreamer’s family indicates that this person will be a victim of deception and that the dreamer will help him reveal what is being deceived. Seeing someone kidnapping the dreamer’s sister means that this person is trying to reveal a secret about that sister, and if the kidnapper is not... Known to the dreamer, the dream portends the imminent marriage of his sister. Among the ominous dreams is that the dreamer sees his sister being kidnapped in front of her house, as this symbolizes that someone is chasing her and has a grudge against her. If someone sees in his dream that he has kidnapped someone he does not know in reality, then his dream It appears that he is characterized by his love for helping those who need help and assistance. Not informing the dreamer of the kidnapping situation that he saw in the dream indicates that the dreamer is safe in secrets. Whoever sees in a dream that he was kidnapped in front of his house, this vision in him indicates that his companion will gain a lot of goodness and his situation will change. For the better. When someone witnesses the kidnapping of children in a dream, this means that he suffers from envy and that his home is not without problems, and this vision may indicate the owner’s desire not to neglect his family. One of the most promising visions is the dream of saving children from kidnapping. Interpretation of kidnapping and escape in A dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of kidnapping and escaping, and the most important dreams that sparked controversy about kidnapping can be traced through the following: Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of kidnapping and escaping in a dream to mean that the dreamer will be affected by anxiety and fear about a particular issue and will also be unable to confront this fear. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of kidnapping related to trade as the visionary’s rush to make fateful decisions that are difficult to return, and this haste can lead to failure in something or achieving loss instead of success. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of kidnapping by someone close to the dreamer, as this Evidence that the dreamer will face great exploitation by this close person, and this in turn will harm him. Whoever sees in a dream that he has been kidnapped in front of his house, this means that the dreamer will be affected by the envy and hatred of those around him. When a person sees in his dream that one of his family members has Kidnapped, this means that the dreamer is exposed to deception, lies, and hypocrisy from one of his relatives, but he is able to solve problems and get rid of deception. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of being kidnapped from his car as a sign that the dreamer is exposed to complex things. It also means sadness, anxiety, grief, anguish, and the inability to face problems. Life. Whoever sees in his dream that he was kidnapped from his home and placed in another home, his vision indicates that he will leave his home and live in a safer place.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sea buckthorn in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying a lot of sea buckthorn and it tastes very good in the dream. It confirms that she will achieve many of the goals that she seeks to achieve and her dreams in this period of her life, God willing. Either an unmarried girl sees in The dream is that she is eating a lot of sea buckthorn, and its taste was very delicious in the dream. This is a sign that she will encounter goodness and livelihood in her life and get rid of the misery in which she lives. The unmarried girl who sees in the dream that she is looking for sea buckthorn in many places and did not find it in The dream. It says that she will try hard to achieve a goal that she desires or a dream that she seeks and that it will be difficult for her. Likewise, an unmarried girl who dreams of distributing sea buckthorn to some of her close ones in a dream. This shows that this single girl will get rid of all the problems and troubles that she is experiencing At this time. See also: Interpretation of seeing apples in a dream and its meaning according to Nablus. Interpretation of seeing sea buckthorn in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband gave her a lot of sea buckthorn in a dream, and she is very happy with it. Here it indicates getting rid of all marital problems. Which he is living or going through at this time, and God knows best. If a married woman was looking for sea buckthorn in a dream, and it was expensive, and she could not buy it in the dream. This is an indication that this married woman will go through a difficult period in her life and will not be able to get rid of it. Easily. And seeing a married woman in a dream that she distributes sea buckthorn to her children and divides it equally among them in the dream. This is an indication of the good upbringing that she gives to her children and preserves for them, God willing, in their lives. Likewise, the dreaming married woman who in the dream eats a lot of sea buckthorn And she was very happy with it in the dream, and it tasted good. This indicates that she will get rid of the problems and bad things in her life and that she will live happily, God willing. Interpretation of seeing sea buckthorn in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams that she ate a lot of sea buckthorn in a dream, and she was She is very happy with him in a dream. She announces that she will marry a good man and he will support her and make her very happy in her life, God willing. Or an absolute vision in a dream that she is eating sea buckthorn in a public place, and this is very beautiful for her in a dream. This is an indication that he will go through a period A major operation during this period, and he will assume a high position in it, God willing. And the divorced woman who in the dream searches for sea buckthorn, let her take it, but she did not find it in the dream. It shows that she will face many problems and difficulties in her life during this period. And the divorced woman who sees in The dream is that she is taking sea buckthorn in a dream, and it tastes very good to her in the dream. This is a clear indication that her life will be beautiful and full of happiness, love, and security, God willing, always. Read also: Pomegranate in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of seeing sea buckthorn in a dream for a man and with

Ibn Sirin believes that dreaming of intense crying is a sign of the coming of goodness, livelihood, and happiness. When the dreamer sees crying without groaning or screaming in the dream, it is a sign of happy occasions and weddings. While seeing crying accompanied by slapping and screaming in The dream symbolizes the imminent death of the dreamer or one of his relatives. If the sleeper sees that he is crying loudly if he hears the Qur’an in the dream, this is evidence of the purity and purity of the dreamer’s heart. If the dreamer sees that he is crying without a sound in the dream, this is a sign of the nearness of comfort and the disappearance of worries and sorrows. Interpretation of a dream about crying out of fear: Seeing an unmarried girl crying loudly out of fear in a dream indicates that she will marry the one she loves and wants. When she sees that she is afraid but cannot cry in her dream, this is a bad vision and does not bode well for the monarch. But if she sees that a married woman is afraid of her husband To the point of crying in a dream, about the marital happiness that she will obtain. While seeing an engaged girl crying profusely out of fear in a dream, it symbolizes the emergence of some problems with her fiancé. Also, this vision in a dream may indicate that the dreamer feels a state of anxiety, fear, and tension, and that God The world of the unseen. Intense crying in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman crying hysterically and tearing clothes in a dream indicates the many responsibilities on her shoulders. When she sees her crying loudly in the dream, and that was at the end of her pregnancy, it is evidence of serious problems during childbirth. But if he sees that he is crying loudly in the dream, and that was at the end of her pregnancy, it is evidence of serious problems during childbirth. High in the dream, this indicates that he is facing some psychological problems in reality. This vision can also indicate in the dream of a pregnant woman, because of her extreme fear of labor and childbirth, and God is the Most High and All-Knowing. If he dreams that he is crying with tears, this is a sign of the nearness of comfort and the end of worries. And sorrows, God willing. title: Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream and its interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream: The passport is the means by which a person can move from one place to another in the world, as it gives its holder this freedom of movement and without being subjected to questions and objections from the competent authorities, as the passport can express the person. Identity, and their origin, while it is considered one of the official documents that can be used to reveal a person’s identity and is approved by many competent official authorities. Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream There are many different dreams that we can dream about, while each dream has many interpretations and explanations. Accordingly, the interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream came with these signs: Many interpreters interpreted this vision as one of the signs of positive changes that will happen to the dreamer in his next life. It is also a sign that the dreamer will actually travel in his life. As Ibn Sirin referred to it Interpreted as a sign of joy and happiness in the dreamer's future life. It is also an indication of the fortuneteller's change for the better and the surrender of his worries. It is noteworthy by humanity for the abundance of food that the god will receive. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing blindness or loss of vision in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a blue passport can That there are many types of passports, and each country has a specific style that it adopts in its passports that it issues to its citizens, while the dream interpretation of a blue passport can indicate: It is considered a sign of the fortuneteller traveling to other countries to complete his studies or to work. In the event of non-marriage The dreamer, this indicates that he will get married soon. Also, this dream is one of the promising food dreams and the great benefit that the dreamer will obtain. See also: Interpretation of seeing a villa in a dream for single and married women. Renewing a passport in a dream. The state must issue many decisions and laws for its children, to guarantee their rights and obtain For what they want, while renewing the passport is one of the decisions issued by the state in many cases, while we see the renewal, it may have arisen as follows: -It is one of the signs that the dreamer’s condition will change for the better in his next life. Also, this dream may differ In its interpretation from one dreamer to another. It should be noted that interpretations of dreams also differ depending on the details that the dreamer came up with in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about a broken passportFor each of the different dreams that the dreamer can see in his life and during his sleep, it can bring many clues and interpretations to the dreamer It is worth noting that the dream interpretation of a torn passport can be accompanied by many of the owner’s interpretations, and we mention the most important of them: -It is considered a sign of poverty, failure, and bad luck for the pioneer. It also indicates that he missed a special travel opportunity that would have happened in his life. While when he sees the passport, It can indicate the beginning of a new life. It is worth noting that it is a sign of happiness and livelihood if the passport appears intact. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hairdressing salon

title: Interpretation of a dream about hugging someone I know in the great scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the chest of someone I know in a dream. Seeing breasts is a vision that expresses the good feelings and relationships that unite the dreamer with the one who embraced him in the dream. This vision shows joy, happiness, and achieving goals, but it should be noted that the interpretation of the dream depends on many of the meanings that the dreamer saw, and we will tell you more about all the meanings and interpretations through this article.Interpretation of a dream about hugging someone I know. The interpretation of dreaming about the chest of someone I know in a dream indicates strong feelings. Which connects the dreamer to this person, but if there are obstacles or problems between you, they will be resolved soon. Lawyers say that seeing hugs in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s feeling of emotional inadequacy and loneliness in his life and his need to form emotional relationships that compensate for the lack of these feelings. If he has this The person has feelings of hatred towards you or you do not trust him, so this is a vision that warns you not to deal with him, as he may be planning a conspiracy against you. Dreaming that you are hugging someone you know can be a symbol of forming a cooperative relationship with them soon and sharing interests with each other, and this vision shows the intensity of longing. Interpretation of a dream about hugging someone I know by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a hug in a dream if the person is known and dear to you is a sign of longevity, good health and care in life. A hug in a dream, if it is followed by a feeling of comfort and happiness, is a sign of positive changes in a man’s life For the better, but if you feel upset and averse to hugs, these are negative changes. Ibn Sirin believes that this vision may indicate a close connection between an unmarried young man, but if it is accompanied by tears, it may symbolize farewell and separation between the dreamer and the person he saw in the vision. Interpretation of a dream Hugging someone I know for singles Seeing the breast of an acquaintance in a dream symbolizes friendship and good relations between them and that person in reality, and also symbolizes communication and good transition in a girl’s life. If a girl feels a great deal of aversion to hugs, this symbolizes that she is not thinking about Marriage issues or she wants to rethink many issues and decisions related to her personal life. If a girl has a problem with the person she hugged in the dream, then this vision is an indication of removing the dispute and consolidating the relations between you again. It also symbolizes a short release and the end of a problem. In a girl’s life. In the event that you see your lover’s chest in a dream for an unmarried woman, Imam Nabulsi says about this, the stability and success of the emotional relationship is if she feels comfortable and accepts the embrace. Interpretation of a dream about someone I know hugging a married woman. Embracing someone I know in a dream for a married woman indicates love and feelings The strong and honest one that unites the wife and this person, but if the husband is a metaphor for the feelings of friendship that unite them. Seeing the breasts of children in a dream is evidence of her feeling of anxiety and extreme fear for the children, but if she sees the arms of someone other than her husband, then this vision symbolizes her fear. From losing his wife

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a serious illness from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about a serious illness, and the interpretation of a dream about recovering from a serious illness.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a serious illness does not necessarily express fatigue or suffering from a physical illness, but many commentators agreed that it is a different type of suffering and may be the result of the presence of people around him who are not loyal and want to harm him. Interpretation of a dream about a serious illness by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about a serious illness? If You dream that you have a serious illness, then you may actually have serious concerns about your health, or it may mean other things that commentators mentioned in their books, which are summarized as follows: Interpretation of a dream about a serious illness Some interpreters talked about it, saying that it shows the opposite. It indicates a lot of money on the way to the dreamer’s possession after working hard and toiling to obtain it. It has also been said that it expresses some psychological distress that he will be exposed to in the coming days due to his inability to choose a loyal friend and his falling victim to the deception and hypocrisy of some. A serious illness, if he suffers from it any From his friends or loved ones and saw him in severe pain while he was sleeping, he may actually feel distressed and in need and should ask him and stand by his side in his judgment until he comes out of this. Seeing him crying because of excessive pain in a dream is a good sign of his desire to change his approach to life after wasting a lot of time In useless matters and decided to change for the better. Al-Nabulsi said that this dream expresses the dreamer’s failure in religious commitment, and what he derives from the lack of blessing in his livelihood as a result. Through Google, you can join us on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation and Visions website and you will find everything you do in it. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a serious illness? The imam said that the dreamer may be very worried about this dream, but sometimes it brings him good news. If he was already sick, he would recover from his illness sooner. (For him) and is not left to satanic obsessions and obsessions. However, if the fortuneteller is a married woman, she may allow others to interfere in her life, believing that they are loyal to her, but it seems to her the opposite, as she is certain that they are unfaithful and tries to sabotage the relationship between them. she has. And her husband to achieve their despicable purposes. If the dreamer is suffering from financial hardship and his circumstances force him to borrow at usury, then the dream came to him to assure him that the path of usury will not bring him any good, and he must hasten to repay it. And religion and striving in his work to achieve the desired efficiency. Interpretation of a dream about a serious illness for a single woman: Seeing a girl who has been out of marriage for a long time and always thinks about this issue and feels a lack of self-confidence because everyone she knows and those of her age have become a family, explains that she needs to turn to her. My Lord, and I pray to Him to ease her worries and make her heart happy. Seeing her writhing in pain is a sign that she is going through a psychological crisis that requires commitment and courage to overcome it peacefully. Many interpretive scholars have said that a bad friend could be a sign of illness and she must choose her friends so that they are not Cause harm to her. But if this disease that afflicted her in the dream was a sign of her high temperature, then she will meet the right person with whom she is safe. But if she sees that one of her parents is suffering from a serious illness,

All this and more...Interpretation of a dream about a piece of blood coming out of the nose in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about pieces of blood coming out of the nose in a dream can lead to getting rid of problems and obstacles, and God knows best. If a married woman sees fragments of blood coming out of her nose, this may express a mood of sadness. And God knows the unseen. If a disabled person sees a piece of blood coming out of his nose in his dream, it may express the problems he faces, and God knows the unseen.
